tool.name: SAGA.statistics_regression.9
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayY_GRIDS True isArrayX_TABLE False isArrayX_GRIDS True output_data_COEFF $output_data_COEFF output_data_R2 $output_data_R2 name SAGA.statistics_regression.9 Y_GRIDS $Y_GRIDS ORDER $ORDER XSOURCE $XSOURCE X_TABLE $X_TABLE X_GRIDS $X_GRIDS prefer $prefer response $response outputType_COEFF $OutputSection_COEFF.outputType_COEFF transmissionMode_COEFF $OutputSection_COEFF.transmissionMode_COEFF outputType_R2 $OutputSection_R2.outputType_R2 transmissionMode_R2 $OutputSection_R2.transmissionMode_R2

param.name: Y_GRIDS
param.label: Dependent Variables
param.help: Dependent Variables The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, png, tiff, x-ogc-envi

param.name: X_TABLE
param.label: Independent Variable (per Grid)
param.help: Independent Variable (per Grid) The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: X_GRIDS
param.label: Independent Variable (per Grid and Cell)
param.help: Independent Variable (per Grid and Cell) The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, png, tiff, x-ogc-envi

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_COEFF
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_COEFF
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_R2
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_R2
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Fits for each cell a polynomial trend function. Outputs are the polynomial coefficients for the polynomial trend function of chosen order.
